A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a diehard Star Wars fan I will love anything  that this franchise produces. There were obvious flaws in this chapter of Star Wars and many things could have been changed to make this a better production. Finn needed a better Storyline\, Rey's parental storyline needed a better plot\, Luke's storyline was...well it was there\, however\, I still loved the story because it served its purpose. Star Wars no matter what happens\, in my opinion\, will always be the series that changed history. I will always stay with it and love it no matter what happens.
